TEXT.TITLE: LADD <LADD.O> UNIT COMPLETES ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Ladd Furniture Inc's Clayton-Marcus Furniture subsidiary said it completed the previously announced purchase of privately-held Colony House Furniture Inc for an undisclosed amount of cash and notes. Reuter
